General.Name: Menora Miv Hld
General.Description: Menora Mivtachim Holdings Ltd operates in insurance and finance sectors in Israel. The company offers life and health, mortgage, disability, critical illness, travel, personal accident, home, and business insurance products, as well as car, third party car, truck, and motorcycle insurance products; and pension and provident funds. It also engages in the mutual funds and securities underwriting, real estate investment, financing and credit, and solar energy activities. The company was formerly known as General Liability Office Ltd. and changed its name to Menora Mivtachim Holdings Ltd in 2006. Menora Mivtachim Holdings Ltd was incorporated in 1935 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
